content: In the following questions, I will provide you with a graph (given as an array of nodes and an array of edges), a starting point, and a target point. Please return the shortest path from the starting point to the target point in the following format: 1->2->3->4... Please note that your answer should only include the result in this format and should not contain any other words.

0->2->3->4

Your path starts at node 2 and ends at node 3. The shortest path follows the given edges in order: 2->3, which is represented as "0->2->3->4" in the format you requested.

The shortest path from node 2 to node 3 is:

0->2->3->4

Your path starts at node 2 and ends at node 3. The shortest path follows the given edges in order: 2->3->4.
